mapper.select: select i.no, i.title, i.content, i.id, m.name, i.writeDate, i.fileName from image i, member m where (m.id = i.id) and no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into image(no, title, content, id, fileName) values(image_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, #{fileName})
mapper.delete: delete from image where no = #{no} and id = #{id}
